name: WePark VIP Membership
description: A VIP membership NFT for the WePark Network, offering premium benefits.

value: Priority booking and reserved parking spaces
Free on-site vacuum service once per month

attributes.value: Access to all WePark network lots including exclusive VIP areas
On-site vacuum service available once per month at no additional cost
15 points for every dollar spent, redeemable for free parking days or services

value: 20% off at partner car wash services
10% discount at nearby retail outlets participating in the WePark network

attributes.value: Eligible to upgrade to 'Elite' status with additional benefits after 24 months or 5000 points
Can be cancelled with a full refund within the first 30 days of issuance
Automatic renewal; notification sent 30 days before renewal with an option to opt-out
Blockchain-based digital signature verification, Dynamic QR code generated at each use, ensuring real-time validation
